ISSUE.TITLE: Add copy icon and functionality next to commonly copied fields
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY This would require some thought but for places where users copy text out of fields we could help them out by providing a shortcut (copy icon) next to the field which would copy the value to their clipboard. https://www.patternfly.org/v4/documentation/react/components/clipboardcopy/

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4967 from jbradberry/missing-dry-run-check-3.8.3 Add in the missing dry-run check for csv analytics collectors
